question: Which of the following statements are true? (Choose two)

answers.A: A security group automatically applies to all instances that you launch.
answers.B: A security group applies to an instance only if you specify the security group at the instance launch time or associate the security group with the instance later.
answers.C: A network ACL automatically applies to all instances in the subnets you associate the ACL with.
answers.D: A network ACL applies to an instance only if you specify a security group for the instance.
